thread.title: Great Scott! Colorado celebrates 'Back to the Future'
thread.title_full: Great Scott! Colorado celebrates 'Back to the Future'

title: Great Scott! Colorado celebrates 'Back to the Future'
text:
Great Scott! Colorado celebrates 'Back to the Future' Get ready for October 21, 2015. Post to Facebook Great Scott! Colorado celebrates 'Back to the Future' Get ready for October 21, 2015.  //on9news.tv/1LmKc34   Join the Conversation To   Great Scott! Colorado celebrates 'Back to the Future' If you believe everything you see in the movies, Marty McFly from "Back to the Future" will appear on October 21st. 9NEWS at 8 a.m. 10/9/15. KUSA Raquel Villanueva, KUSA 6:07 p.m. MDT October 9, 2015 Mural at Bella Vista 1 CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
DENVER - In a world where Wiz Khalifa can g et arrested for riding a hoverboard and the Cubs have an actual shot at winning the World Series - "Back to the Future II" deserves some respect. 
And the good people of Colorado are ready to give it. 
Three Denver street artists are finishing up a countdown clock mural worthy of Marty McFly's approval. With a date set for Oct. 21, 2015 - it commemorates the classic time-travel scene. A video posted by GAMMA (@gammagallery) on Oct 8, 2015 at 5:07pm PDT 
Located outside the Bella Vista restaurant at East 20th Avenue and Sherman Street, the art is the work of Delton, Jher and Gamma. 
And the Boulder Public Library' is ready to celebrate with its "Welcome to the Future, Marty McFly" party. 
It starts (fittingly) at 4:29 p.m. on the afternoon of Oct. 21.
